actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage the continued investment of equity capital in independent small businesses.
short_title: Small Business and Farms Capital Preservation Act

summary.text: Small Business and Farms Capital Preservation Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual who has held an equity or unsecured investment in a small business concern for 12 months or longer to elect nonrecognition of any gain from the sale of such investment to the extent such gain is reinvested in a small business concern.

titles.title: Small Business and Farms Capital Preservation Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage the continued investment of equity capital in independent small businesses.
